trans-unit.source: Implements a basic data transfer mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 实现一种基本的数据传输机制。

trans-unit.source: DataObject implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface, whose methods provide a format-independent mechanism for data transfer.
trans-unit.target: 数据对象实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>接口，其方法提供的数据传输格式无关机制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>

trans-unit.source: A DataObject is typically used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> and in drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: DataObject 通常用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>和在拖放操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: The DataObject class provides the recommended implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 数据对象类提供的建议的实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>

trans-unit.source: It is suggested that you use the DataObject class rather than implementing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> yourself.
trans-unit.target: 建议你使用数据对象类而不是实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>自行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>

trans-unit.source: Multiple pieces of data in different formats can be stored in a DataObject.
trans-unit.target: 多个不同格式的数据可以存储在数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Data is retrieved from a DataObject by its associated format.
trans-unit.target: 从数据对象由其关联的格式来检索数据。

trans-unit.source: Because the target application might not be known, you can increase the likelihood that the data will be in the appropriate format for an application by placing the data in a DataObject in multiple formats.
trans-unit.target: 因为目标应用程序可能未知，你可以增加的数据将以正确的格式为应用程序通过将数据放在以多种格式的数据对象中的可能性。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> for the predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>对预定义的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>

trans-unit.source: You can implement your own format by creating an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>的实例实现您自己的格式

trans-unit.source: To store data in a DataObject, pass the data to the constructor or call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在数据对象中存储数据，将数据传递给构造函数或调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add data in multiple formats to the same DataObject.
trans-unit.target: 可以将数据以多种格式添加到相同的数据对象中。

trans-unit.source: If you want the data you add to be retrieved in its native format only, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Object%29> with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望数据则添加要在其本机格式，这仅调用检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Object%29>与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: Data can be retrieved from a DataObject in any format which is compatible with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以从任何格式，这是与兼容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A> DataObject 检索数据

trans-unit.source: For example, text can be converted to Unicode.
trans-unit.target: 例如，文本可以转换为 Unicode。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data in the format in which it was stored, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A> with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索已存储的格式中的数据，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine what formats the data is stored in, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定的数据存储在何种格式，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine if a format is available, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> with the desired format.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定一种格式是否可用，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>与所需的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the DataObject class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with data in common formats.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，数据对象类提供了其他方法，使得更轻松地处理数据通用格式。

trans-unit.source: To add data of a particular format to the DataObject, use the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要将特定的格式的数据添加到数据对象，使用相应`Set`*格式*方法，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetText%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetText%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data of a particular format from the DataObject, first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A>) to determine whether the DataObject contains data in that format, then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A>) to retrieve the data if the DataObject contains it.
trans-unit.target: 若要从数据对象中检索特定格式的数据，请先调用相应`Contains`*格式*方法 (如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A>) 来确定数据对象是否包含该格式的数据，然后调用相应`Get`*格式*方法 (如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A>) 来检索数据，如果数据对象包含它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 使用剪贴板使用图元文件格式时，可能需要特殊的注意事项。

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the DataObject class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format.
trans-unit.target: 由于数据对象类的当前实现中存在的限制，使用.NET Framework 的图元文件格式可能使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序上无法识别。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs).
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你必须进行互操作与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口 (Api)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅文章 323530，"图元文件上剪贴板是不可见对所有应用程序，"http://support.microsoft.com 在 Microsoft 知识库。

trans-unit.source: > > An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: >> 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放在剪贴板上。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization> for more information on serialization.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>有关序列化的详细信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>

trans-unit.source: If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标应用程序需要一种非常具体的数据格式，标头添加到序列化过程中的数据可能会阻止应用程序不能识别你的数据。

trans-unit.source: To preserve your data format, add your data as a <xref:System.Byte> array to a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> and pass the <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留数据格式，请添加你的数据作为<xref:System.Byte>数组到<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>并将传递<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A> </xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> </xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> </xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref> class and adds the specified object to it.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref>类并向其添加指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can add data in any format to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> when you use this constructor, or you can add data as an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> to provide multiple formats at once.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将数据添加到任何格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>时使用此构造函数，也可以添加数据作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>提供多种格式一次。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with COM programming, you can also add a data object that implements the COM `IDataObject` interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果你熟悉 COM 编程，你还可以添加数据对象实现 COM`IDataObject`接口。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see `IDataObject` in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅`IDataObject`http://msdn.microsoft.com/library 上 MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.target: 要存储的数据。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref>类并添加指定的对象中指定的格式。

trans-unit.target: 指示数据对象是否包含中的数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio"></xref>格式。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此数据对象包含指定的格式; 中的文本数据否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsAudio%2A>方法来确定数据对象是否包含使用此方法进行检索之前音频数据。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.ContainsAudio%2A>

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetAudio%2A>方法将音频数据添加到数据对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetAudio%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the data associated with the specified data format.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定的数据格式关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法找不到指定的格式中的数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。

trans-unit.source: If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或使用自动转换设置为存储数据`false`，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>在调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A>之前</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A> for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>的数据的有效格式的列表存储在此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 数据可以转换为另一种格式，如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: > > When `format` is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower.
trans-unit.target: >> 时`format`是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>，此方法返回的 utf-8 编码字符串的应用程序面向.NET 4.5 或更高版本，并且 ANSI 编码面向.NET 4.0 或更低的应用程序中的字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>

trans-unit.source: Returns the data associated with the specified data format, using an automated conversion parameter to determine whether to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定的数据格式，使用自动的转换参数确定是否将数据转换为格式关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: If the `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果`autoConvert`参数是`true`和此方法不能在指定的格式中查找数据，它会尝试将数据转换为格式。

trans-unit.source: If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with the automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或使用自动转换设置为存储数据`false`，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, this method returns data in the specified format, or `null` if no data in this format can be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果`autoConvert`参数是`false`，此方法返回数据中指定的格式，或`null`如果找不到此格式中的没有数据。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> before calling GetData.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>之前调用 GetData。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A> for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>的数据的有效格式的列表存储在此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 数据可以转换为另一种格式，如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: > > When `format` is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower.
trans-unit.target: >> 时`format`是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>，此方法返回的 utf-8 编码字符串的应用程序面向.NET 4.5 或更高版本，并且 ANSI 编码面向.NET 4.0 或更低的应用程序中的字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>

trans-unit.source: Obtains data from a source data object.
trans-unit.target: 从源数据对象中获取数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData*> method, which is called by a data consumer, renders the data described in the specified <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC> structure and transfers it through the specified <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData*>方法，它由数据使用者调用，呈现的数据中指定所述<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC>结构并将其传送通过指定<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>结构。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData*>

trans-unit.source: The caller then assumes responsibility for releasing the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> structure.
trans-unit.target: 调用方然后负责释放<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>结构。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify more than one medium by using the Boolean OR operator, allowing the method to choose the best medium among those specified.
trans-unit.target: 它是可以通过使用布尔 OR 运算符，从而允许方法在选择最佳的介质中做出指定指定多个介质。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> structure that indicates the storage medium containing the returned data through its <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> member, and the responsibility for releasing the medium through the value of its <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> member.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含指向的<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>结构，指示包含通过返回的数据的存储介质其<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>成员和用于释放通过的值的介质的责任其<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>成员。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the receiver of the medium is responsible for releasing it; otherwise, <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> points to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IUnknown" name="IUnknown" href=""></xref> interface on the appropriate object so its <xref uid="langword_csharp_Release" name="Release" href=""></xref> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，介质的接收方负责释放它; 否则为<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>指向<xref uid="langword_csharp_IUnknown" name="IUnknown" href=""></xref>因此接口上的相应对象其<xref uid="langword_csharp_Release" name="Release" href=""></xref>可以调用方法。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM>
